Release notes

1.2

  • 02/03/2011 : main/anim button. To activate/disactivate anim_cbk.
  • 02/03/2011 : open_file : povama, iv : set_scene_matrix.
  • 02/03/2011 : open_file : povama, iv : use inlib::sg::infos to sign the sg.
  • 02/03/2011 : wall : iv.
  • 02/03/2011 : povama from exlib/povama.

1.1

  • 03/02/2011 : ftp, root : directory no more prefixed with "d: " but shown with a grey background (files being in white).
  • 03/02/2011 : implement Apple document interchange for known file types. For example now GoodReader can "Open in..." toward ioda.
  • 13/01/2011 : ftp.
  • 11/01/2011 : params button/panel.
  • 11/01/2011 : .fog : solid, edges, light.

  • 11/01/2011 : cam -> camera.

  • 07/01/2011 : examples/lighten cube.
  • 07/01/2011 : examples/entries : have labels : text, uint, int, real.
  • 07/01/2011 : desktop : -iPhone4.

1.0

  • 05/01/2011 : App Store acceptance.
  • 27/12/2010 : Android Market submission/acceptance.
  • 20/09/2010 : birth of ioda. Creation of the repository.
  • 30/06/2010 : decide to create a new graphic system on OpenGL-ES.
